thumb.title: Dash it Out podcast guest Richard Blank Costa Ricas Call Center
thumb.description: Have you ever gotten a call from a call center? and wonder what went on behind the scenes. Well on this all-new episode of Dash It Out, Featuring Co-Host Richard Blank a chief executive officer for Costa Rica's call centerWell on this all-new episode of Dash It Out, Featuring Co-Host Richard Blank a chief executive officer for Costa Rica's call center.He's here to discuss advanced telemarketing strategies, conflict management, interpersonal soft skills, customer support, rhetoric, gamification, pinball machines, employee motivation, phonetic microexpression readings, and the overall pros and cons of artificial intelligence.After hour's talk brought to the daytime. Let's not avoid sensitive topics but dash it out!Real talk with real people from every walk of life.You'll never wait for happy hour again!https://youtu.be/4LbbemrTfrkhttps://youtube.com/shorts/TMXpSSFT6a0https://youtu.be/RRoqQvW2Rp4https://youtu.be/ZU2un3jJmsIhttps://youtu.be/EcbRVzkMEQ8https://youtube.com/shorts/ew7tm6mOUmAhttps://youtube.com/shorts/ellTox1Hiswhttps://youtube.com/shorts/C5Ay2YFSXrY
